title: Pixel 3a notification are either delayed or do not appear while at home (WiFi)
content:
Two questions: 

Notification delay - I purchased my 3a about a month ago. It works great but I started noticing right away that notifications from my apps seem delayed once the screen goes dark.  None of our other Android phones (not Pixels) do this, and my old phone didn't.

Override Do Not Disturb: That said, I have 3 security apps that I MUST receive notifications from even when under Do Not Disturb (DND). Is there a way to push them through the DND mode? They are security cameras, motion sensors, etc...
